articles.author: Alex Raskin Sports
articles.title: ESPN's Shaka Hislop speaks out after fainting during LIVE report - Daily Mail
articles.description: ESPN commentator and former Premier League goalkeeper Shaka Hislop has spoken out for the first time since fainting during Sunday's live broadcast in Los Angeles. 'Well, that was awkward,' he said.
articles.content:
ESPN commentator and former Premier League goalkeeper Shaka Hislop has spoken out for the first time since fainting during Sunday's live broadcast in Los Angeles. 
'Well, that was awkward,' a smilin… [+3404 chars]
